price: They said, “Our Lord, we fear that he may hasten to punish us or transgress all bounds.”
arabic: قَالَا رَبَّنَآ إِنَّنَا نَخَافُ أَن يَفۡرُطَ عَلَيۡنَآ أَوۡ أَن يَطۡغَىٰ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
